Articles.Content:
This is a rocket that can lift heavy load to the moon and into orbit (over 70 kerbal mass units)

inside is a nuclear reactor

it cant land on the moon because i haven\'t added landing legs to the cargo (but you can if you want)

this rocket it only a prototype that is to test the rockets lifting capability.

it uses

the KW challenge mod pack

nova punch

and a few others i can\'t remember

(just look at the pics you will probably be able to guess)

UPDATED VERSION COMING SOON

0.15
